data.prayer: Father, help the 75,121 believers in Kwilu to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kwilu, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kwilu, Democratic Republic of the Congo. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kwilu to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 75,121 believers in the state of Kwilu the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kwilu, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Kwilu who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Kwilu, Democratic Republic of the Congo to the gospel today.
